title: BRIEF-Bragg Gaming Group Anticipates Record Revenue Growth In Q3 2019
text:
BRIEF-Bragg Gaming Group Anticipates Record Revenue Growth In Q3 2019

Stock Markets 5 minutes ago (Oct 08, 2019 08:50)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Bragg Gaming Group Anticipates Record Revenue Growth In Q3 2019 Oct 8 (Reuters) - Bragg Gaming Group Inc : * BRAGG GAMING GROUP ANTICIPATES RECORD REVENUE GROWTH IN THIRD QUARTER 2019 * BRAGG GAMING GROUP INC - EXPECT TO ACHIEVE Q3 2019 REVENUE GROWTH OF OVER 25 PER CENT AGAINST SAME PERIOD LAST YEAR
